(I did wait to order so swelling after the procedure wouldn't be a factor, please make sure you take that into consideration as well!) The fabric and sewing are top quality; I have extremely sensitive skin and this doesn't make me itch or cause a rash. That in itself is a miracle! My suggestion would be to provide a length measurement from top to  where it folds over and where the line openings are from the ends, I think it would help with making sizing decisions for those who are in between. In all, I would absolutely purchase another one and I would not hesitate to recommend them.
